name: GPT2Alpaca Pipeline
shortDescription: This project demonstrates how to build a machine learning pipeline for fine-tuning GPT2 on Alpaca dataset with the technologies of TensorFlow Extended(TFX), KerasNLP, TensorFlow, and Hugging Face Hub.
longDescription: This project demonstrates how to build a machine learning pipeline for fine-tuning GPT2 on Alpaca dataset with the technologies of TensorFlow Extended(TFX), KerasNLP, TensorFlow, and Hugging Face Hub.
